ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(Contains(RecordType.Name, 'Master Campaign')), RecordType.Name != 'Commercial', RecordType.Name != "Dummy Campaign" , OR( INCLUDES(RTL_Campaign_Channel__c, "1 Outbound call" ) , INCLUDES(RTL_Campaign_Channel__c, "2 Outbound DealerDistributorNetwork") ) ,OR( ISBLANK( RTL_Call_End_Date__c ) , ISBLANK( RTL_Call_Start_Date__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter call start/end date if the channel "Outbound" or "Branch" was chosen.
